item.title: ‘Jesus Take the Wheel’ Songwriter Brett James Killed in Plane Crash
item.description: Brett James, the Grammy-winning songwriter known for Carrie Underwood’s 2005 smash “Jesus, Take the Wheel” and Kenny Chesney’s “When the Sun Goes Down,” died Thursday in a small-engine plane crash in
